name: Oh Well
description:
Oh Well...

Experience the journey of a frog warrior to find his way off an abandoned well.

This game is a student project developed in Vancouver Film School, by term 3 students of Game Design and Programming courses.

- How to Play -

Pro Tip: For a better experience play with a game pad/controller plug into your PC.

Pro Tip 2: For better visuals, audio and performance, please download the Windows version below.

❤️ - The Team - ❤️

Garrett York - Level Designer

Itzel Salvador - Programmer & Sound Designer

Rodrigo Vieira - Programmer & Technical Designer

Thayden Adamek - 2D Artist & Animator
